sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Corrupt updates are one of the most common causes of Windows blue screen errors.
Installing the wrong driver can disable hardware completely until corrected.
Slow performance on macOS is often caused by background processes, not hardware failure.
Many failed installs can be repaired without wiping the system or losing files.
Bloatware can increase boot times by several minutes and cause app conflicts.
